entry.title: Ethereum Name Service Domains Surpass 1M and Stoke Burn Rate
entry.summary: Demand for Ethereum Name Service domain names is surging. On May 2, the blockchain-based naming protocol known as ENS surpassed the milestone of one million created names. A record 63,723 names were registered on May 2, and10,000 to 20,000 were registered daily over the past seven days according to Dune Analytics. Prior to the surge, … Ethereum Name Service Domains Surpass 1M and Stoke Burn Rate Read More »

entry.title: Solana Reckons With Seven-Hour Outage After Bot Swarm
Otherside Hangover – What the Hell Happened?! BAYC-Hem
entry.summary: So, the Yuga Labs Otherside sale took place this weekend and if you hadn’t noticed, it basically clogged up Ethereum so badly that the entire network had to stop and wait for the insanity to end before it could resume doing all the other important business it had to do. entry.title: SuperRare is Coming to SoHo
entry.summary: NFT platform SuperRare is opening a gallery in New York City.

entry.title: DAO Buys a Team in Ice Cube’s Basketball League
entry.summary: DeGods have acquired the Killer 3s, a basketball team in rapper Ice Cube's BIG3 league.
